bug.author: AasthaNagpal
bug.summary: Create a function to compute positive negative and neutral tweets.
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Create a function to compute negative (-1), neutral (0) and positive (+1) analysis</denchmark-h>

def getAnalysis(score):
if score < 0:
return 'Negative'
elif score == 0:
return 'Neutral'
else:
return 'Positive'
df['Analysis'] = df['Polarity'].apply(getAnalysis)
<denchmark-h:h1>Show the dataframe</denchmark-h>

df
This program doesn't creates analysis column.
